name: Joey Blount

name: Paris Johnson Jr.

name: Trey Benson
comment: Dec 18: Benson (ankle) didn't take part in Wednesday's practice, Josh Weinfuss of ESPN.com reports.

name: Matt Prater
comment: Dec 18: Head coach Jonathan Gannon said that Prater (knee) will be designated for return from injured reserve Wednesday, Darren Urban of the Cardinals' official site reports.

name: Sean Murphy-Bunting
comment: Dec 17: Murphy-Bunting recorded two tackles (one solo) and one interception in Arizona's win over New England on Sunday.

name: Darius Robinson
comment: Dec 17: Robinson recorded three tackles (one solo), including 1.0 sacks, in the Cardinals' win over the Patriots on Sunday.

name: Max Melton
comment: Dec 15: Melton (shin) is questionable to return to Sunday's contest against the Patriots, Tyler Drake of ArizonaSports.com reports.

name: Jesse Luketa
comment: Dec 15: Luketa (thigh) has been ruled out for the rest of Sunday's contest against the Patriots.

name: Mack Wilson Sr.
comment: Dec 15: Wilson was ruled out with a concussion for the remainder of Sunday's game against the Patriots, Darren Urban of the Cardinals' official site reports.

name: Blake Gillikin
comment: Dec 14: Arizona placed Gillikin (foot) on injured reserve Saturday, Theo Mackie of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Emari Demercado
comment: Dec 14: The Cardinals placed Demercado (back) on injured reserve Saturday, Theo Mackie of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Elijah Jones
comment: Dec 13: Jones (ankle) has been ruled out for Sunday's matchup against New England, Zach Gershman of the Cardinals' official site reports.

name: Dennis Gardeck
comment: Oct 25: The Cardinals placed Gardeck (knee) on injured reserve Friday, Darren Urban of the team's official site reports.

name: Bilal Nichols
comment: Oct 15: The Cardinals placed Nichols (undisclosed) on injured reserve Tuesday, and he is expected to miss the rest of the regular season, Adam Schefter of ESPN reports.

name: Will Hernandez
comment: Oct 8: Hernandez (knee) was placed on injured reserve Tuesday.

name: Justin Jones
comment: Sep 25: Jones (triceps) was placed on injured reserve Wednesday.

name: BJ Ojulari
comment: Aug 5: The Cardinals placed Ojulari (knee) on injured reserve Monday, Darren Urban of the team's official site reports.

name: Carter O'Donnell
comment: Jul 24: O'Donnell (undisclosed) reverted to the Cardinals' injured reserve Wednesday, Aaron Wilson of KPRC 2 Houston reports.
